comments.body:
It looks like we need divider set to {{@null}} and dividerHeight to {{0}}:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1914477/how-to-remove-line-inbetween-two-listviews-in-android
We have resolved TIMOB-16865, can we now do the same for ListView?
